reference-wr.title: Hardware and Software Requirements for a Remote Log Server
reference-wr.shortdesc: For centralized log collection, a properly equipped and configured log server is required.

section.p:
US77159 / US83068 new topic
The server must use a supported version of CentOS or Ubuntu.
For specific supported OS versions, refer to the README file included with the Remote Log Server component of the Titanium Server SDK.
The hardware must meet the minimum requirements for the operating system.
The server must be configured with an ELK stack.
For users unfamiliar with ELK, the Titanium Server SDK includes a utility for installing and configuring a basic ELK stack setup.
The server must be assigned an IP address accessible from the Titanium Server OAM network.
